original_text: This is a list of the ancestors of Jesus Christ. Jesus was from the family of King David. David was from the family of Abraham.
korean_text: 아브라함과 다윗의 자손 예수 그리스도의 계보라

sentences.original_text: This is a list of the ancestors of Jesus Christ.
Jesus was from the family of King David.
David was from the family of Abraham.
